attributes.action: Consider Justice Minister Jack Straw's position
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This man could be the biggest threat to national security as we know it. He has been the main principle for the early release of prisoners. He also insists that judges take a soft approach to sentencing for convicted criminals. It is clear that he fails to understand what his actual job is supposed to be and it is high time he was retired to the back benches.
